text: Kendriya Vidyalaya, Nowrozabad is a school in Umaria, Madhya Pradesh, India. It is situated in the township of SECL. Well renowned celebrities like Nitish Khulbe used to come here from neighbouring towns, with the farthest 30 kilometers away . The school is affiliated to CBSE and the medium of instruction is English/Hindi. == Sports and games == Physical and Health education are an integral part of the academics. The students participate in sports activities at different levels, namely : * Within the Vidyalaya between different houses into which the students are divided, * Between two or more Vidyalayas at the cluster level, * Between clusters at the regional level, * Between regions at the national level. == Address == * Kendriya Vidyalaya * G.M. Complex * S.E.C.L. Nowrozabad * Dist: Umaria * Madhya Pradesh 484555 == See also == * Kendriya Vidyalaya * :Category:Schools in India ==External links== * Kendriya Vidyalaya Nowrozabad * Kendriya Vidyalaya Sangathan * Directory of Schools List in India States Category:Schools in Madhya Pradesh Category:Kendriya Vidyalayas Category:Umaria district
title: Kendriya Vidyalaya Nowrozabad
